title: Exquisite Diamond Vaddanam Nagas Pendant - Navaratan Style
features: This pendant features a contemporary take on the traditional Nagas design, perfect for a Vaddanam belt or a long chain Haaram. The intricate openwork design showcases a floral and leaf motif meticulously set with brilliant-cut diamonds. The central design is clustered for visual weight and draws the eyes.
occasions: and evening wear. Suits both traditional Telugu celebrations (like Pasupu Kumkuma) and modern parties.
description: A harmonious blend of traditional South Indian aesthetics and modern design sensibilities. The exceptional diamond brilliance and delicate gold work make it a timeless investment piece. Its versatile design allows it to be worn in multiple ways, showcasing its adaptability and enduring style.
